column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ Anti-Human Trafficking and Police Force and Sihanouk Police Inspectorate arrested two Chinese Suspects at 1:00 pm on September 6
column6: ------They stand accused of production and distribution of risqué leaflets touting sexual services.------The cops went on to search the suspects’ accommodation at the SPA shop in Sihanoukville City
column7: bringing in 10 Chinese women for further questioning. ------On the site 72 pornographic pamphlets
column11: and a three way radio used to listen to police transmissions.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/368371------
